Articles.Content: I'm going for a VERY realistic mod set of mods and I was wondering if there was a mod that allowed me to bring a ship over to the other ship and maybe bring it back to the ksc?

I think your question is too general/vague to be answered comprehensively.

However you do say "VERY realistic".  In real life small vessels are designed to be recoverable by specific  craft.  The space shuttle was one craft that could deploy and recover smaller craft.  So in that respect the mod you are looking for is KSP itself.  The stock game features pretty much all the tech we have available to us today - but made considerably easier to use.  I'd say what you're looking for is already right at your fingertips.

That said, people have landed asteroids by attaching wings to them using advanced grabbing units.  I'm sure with practice you could do something similar to vessels that were not specifically designed to be recovered.

Edited February 24, 2018 by NewtSoup
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.
A great recovery mod is called FMRS. Short for Flight Manager For Reusable Stages. Look it up and be impressed.
